void Source_Echange_Th_VDF::associer_pb ( const Probleme_base &  pb) [virtual]

Implements Source_base.

Definition at line 71 of file Source_Echange_Th_VDF.cpp.

References Eval_Echange_Himp_VDF_Elem::associer_champs(), Cerr, MorEqn::equation(), Iterateur_Source_VDF::evaluateur(), Process::exit(), finl, h, Equation_base::inconnue(), Terme_Source_VDF_base::iter, pb_voisin, REF, and sub_type.

{
// Associe les zones a l'iterateur et a l'evaluateur
  Eval_Echange_Himp_VDF_Elem& eval = (Eval_Echange_Himp_VDF_Elem&) iter.evaluateur();
  REF(Equation_base) eqn;
  bool eq_OK=false;
  for (int i=0; i<pb_voisin->nombre_d_equations(); i++)
    if (sub_type(Conduction,pb_voisin->equation(i))
        ||sub_type(Convection_Diffusion_Temperature,pb_voisin->equation(i)))
      {
        eqn=pb_voisin->equation(i);
        eq_OK=true;
      }
  if (!eq_OK)
    {
      Cerr << "Source_Echange_Th_VDF is not coupled to a problem solving temperature." << finl;
      exit();
    }
  eval.associer_champs(equation().inconnue(), eqn->inconnue(),h);

}
